Description: Stunning modern home in prime LA location. Open floor plan with chef's kitchen, hardwood floors throughout. Master suite with spa-like bathroom. Beautifully landscaped yard with outdoor entertaining area.
Luxurious coastal living at its finest. Steps from the beach, this architectural masterpiece features floor-to-ceiling windows, gourmet kitchen, and rooftop deck with ocean views.
Exquisite estate in prestigious Beverly Hills. Smart home technology, theater room, wine cellar, infinity pool, and guest house. Unparalleled luxury and privacy.
Charming craftsman home with original details. Updated kitchen and baths, hardwood floors, cozy fireplace. Excellent Pasadena schools and walkable neighborhood.
Modern townhouse in desirable Glendale community. Open concept living, two-car garage, private patio. Low-maintenance living with resort-style amenities.
Contemporary Hollywood Hills home with city views. Sleek design, high-end finishes, outdoor kitchen. Perfect for entertaining and LA lifestyle.
Luxury high-rise condo with panoramic ocean views. Concierge service, fitness center, pool. Walk to restaurants and beach. Resort-style living.
Magnificent new construction estate. Cinema, gym, spa, smart home automation throughout. Separate guest house and pool house. Trophy property.
Venice beach bungalow with modern updates. Bright and airy, chef's kitchen, outdoor shower. Walk to Abbot Kinney and beach. True Venice living.
Stunning Malibu retreat with ocean and mountain views. Indoor-outdoor living, infinity pool, outdoor kitchen. Privacy and serenity minutes from beaches.
Modern waterfront condo in vibrant downtown Long Beach. Floor-to-ceiling windows, balcony with harbor views, assigned parking. Walk to dining and entertainment.
Architectural gem in Sunset Plaza. Open floor plan, walls of glass, infinity pool with city views. Minutes from Sunset Strip nightlife.
Coastal contemporary home steps from the beach. Vaulted ceilings, gourmet kitchen, rooftop deck. Enjoy beach living and stunning sunsets.
Historic Pasadena estate with original character and modern updates. Hardwood floors, built-ins, formal dining. Mature landscaping and rose gardens.
Family home in top-rated La Canada school district. Spacious floor plan, office, bonus room. Large yard with pool and fruit trees.
Contemporary townhouse near Sony Studios. Modern kitchen, two-car garage, rooftop deck. Easy access to Westside beaches and downtown.
Silver Lake hillside home with reservoir views. Mid-century modern design, floor-to-ceiling windows, deck. Vibrant neighborhood with cafes and boutiques.
New construction on iconic Abbot Kinney. Designer finishes throughout, rooftop deck, smart home. Walk to trendy shops and restaurants.
Elegant Santa Monica home near Montana Avenue shopping. Open floor plan, high ceilings, chef's kitchen. Backyard oasis with pool and outdoor kitchen.
Modern luxury estate south of Wilshire. Clean lines, walls of glass, pool/spa. Close to Century City and Golden Triangle.
